00100       struct MapIDEqualCmp : public binary_function<const MapLockElement*, const MapLockElement*, bool> {
00101          bool operator() (const MapLockElement* elm, const MapLockElement* elm2) const {
00102             return (*elm) == (*elm2);
00103          }
